name: gifted-md@v5.0.0
description: I am Gifted-Md Whatsapp MultiDevice Whatsapp Bot built in NodeJs to make whatsapp experience better

MODE.description: Put Mode either public or private

OWNER_NAME.description: Put the name of Bot Owner

AUTO_STICKER.description: Put true/false to enable auto conversion of videos and photos as stickers

SESSION_ID.description: Put your SESSION_ID.  Must start with Gifted~

NOT_ALLOW.description: Put value true to disable bot in pm during public mode.

WELCOME.description: Put true or false to enableand disable group welcoming and goodbye messages

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Put true if you want bot to view status

AUTO_READ.description: Put true if you want bot to read message

AUTO_TYPING.description: Put true if you want bot to show typing

AUTO_RECORDING.description: Put true if you want bot to show recording audio

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Put true if you want bot to show always online

AUTO_DOWNLOAD.description: Put true if you need to download media by using link without cmd

AUTO_BLOCK.description: Put true if you want bot to auto block only 212 numbers

AUTO_REACT.description: Put value to true or false

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Put your heroku app name as entered above.

PREFIX.description: You can leave blank for bot to use multiple prefixes

DEPLOYMENT_PLATFORM.description: Leave the value to default unless otherwise.

AUTO_REJECT_CALLS.description: Put true if you want to reject call
